= *How to use ?* =
1. Copy+Paste the above code in your browser and make a bookmark
<br/>2. Click the newly created bookmark
<br/>3. In the top box, paste the entire contents of your css file
<br/>4. Click on "Extract CSS!!" button
<br/>5. The bottom box displays the CSS being used by the page.
<br/>6. Copy the extracted CSS from bottom box and use it.
<br/>7. Click the close button
